import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Row, Col, Input, Button, Form, Card } from 'antd'; import style from './CreateQue.module.css' // import Axios from "../config/axios.setup" const { TextArea } = Input; export class CreateQue extends Component { state = { questionNo: 1, ch1: Number, ch2: Number, ch3: Number, ch4: Number, Answer: Number } onClickAdd = e => { console.log(e.target.value); //check number } putAnswerFrom =(e) => { console.log(e.target.value) } render() { const { getFieldDecorator } = this.props.form return (

Question {this.state.questionNo}

{this.state.ch1}

{this.state.ch2}

{this.state.ch3}

{this.state.ch4}

Ans
{getFieldDecorator("field", { rules: [ { required: true, message: 'Please input an equation!', } ] })()}
) } } const WrappedAdvancedSearchForm = Form.create({ name: 'advanced_search' })(CreateQue); export default WrappedAdvancedSearchForm
